name: Meal on Demand
description:
My entry to Godot Wild Jam #53.

The game can be played with a mouse or a touchscreen.

It was developed with Godot (Mono) using the F# programming language.
Full source code available for download (CC0 1.0 Universal).

Credits

ProgrammingThomas Corbière
